title: Small-Scale Buffalo Farm Management System Design and Operational Training Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic agricultural terminology and fundamental smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Language-Integrated Project-Based Learning: Analyzing Thai Smallholder Farming Cases to Explore Solutions for Local Agricultural Challenges

learning_goals: Learners can write a prototype design document for a buffalo management app for smallholder farmers by applying the ADDIE model
Learners can convert and explain buffalo breeding cycle management items (feed, vaccination, reproduction) into a digital record system
Propose at least three user-centered interface design principles that reflect the needs of local farmers

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
